# OpenClaw Private Setup

> White-glove deployment service for OpenClaw, the open-source AI assistant. We deploy, configure, and optimize your private AI so you can skip the technical complexity and get straight to results.

## What We Do

OpenClaw Private Setup is a done-for-you service that deploys OpenClaw on your own infrastructure in under 24 hours. OpenClaw is an open-source AI chief of staff that manages email, calendar, messaging, and automates workflows — running 24/7 on hardware you control.

## Key Facts

- **Service:** White-glove OpenClaw deployment and configuration
- **Price:** $1,000 flat fee (includes setup + 15 days priority support)
- **Timeline:** Under 24 hours from discovery call to live system
- **Delivery:** Remote setup available worldwide; in-person available in Dallas, TX area
- **Data Privacy:** 100% private — your data stays on your infrastructure, never touches shared servers
- **Support:** Includes hands-on training session + 15 days of priority support

## What's Included

- Custom OpenClaw deployment on your hardware
- Security hardening and access controls
- Integration with your tools (email, calendar, messaging, etc.)
- Personalized AI configuration based on your workflow
- Hands-on onboarding and training session
- 15 days of priority support
- Extended support packages available

## Who It's For

- Executives who value time over tinkering
- Founders scaling faster than their team
- Professionals who want AI that knows their context
- Anyone who wants a private AI assistant without the technical hassle

## How It Works

1. **Discovery Call** (15 minutes) — Tell us about your tools and workflow
2. **We Build** — We deploy and configure everything
3. **You're Live** — Working AI assistant in under 24 hours
4. **Ongoing Support** — 15 days of priority help + training

## Contact

- Website: https://privatesetup.openclaw.ai
- Email: hello@openclaw.ai
- Location: Remote worldwide + in-person (Dallas, TX area)

## Related

- OpenClaw (open-source project): https://openclaw.ai
- OpenClaw Documentation: https://docs.openclaw.ai
